Real Pro Gamblers

In It Together

Step 3:  Follow

Here's where it gets interesting....

Just how good is this pro?

title: Better Bet
description:
Welcome to Better Bet! – The modern solution to engage staff and bring everyone together around a global sporting event.

Better Bet is a free tipping app that allows you and your colleagues to participate in friendly sports tipping competitions - even if you don't know anything about the sport. 

There is no money involved, just the satisfaction of beating your colleagues (and of course collecting any prizes that your company offers). That’s why it’s called Better Bet.

All major sporting competitions will be available for tipping on our app. The upcoming tournaments that will be offered include Wimbledon, Rugby World Cup, Melbourne Cup, Australian Open, UEFA Champions and Europa League (Final Stages), NRL & AFL (Finals Round), IPL, BBL, Euro Cup, Football World Cup and many more.

Simple Steps to use the app:

•	Setup your login and password for the tournament chosen by your organisation
•	On the home page, select any tournament from the "In Play" list
•	On the BET page, please select the match and place your bets for the available options
•	All tipping bets can be edited until the match has commenced in real time
•	You can also use the Auto-Bet functionality as many times as you like to place random tipping bets 
•	Once a match is completed, the results will be updated overnight on a daily basis 
•	The ranking list is also updated daily once the match results have been confirmed 
•	The top ranked players at the end of the competition are all eligible to win prizes as allocated by their company

If you forget to place a bet, don't know the teams or don't like sports - we've got your covered. Our auto-bet function will make your choice for you.

Any more questions, please visit our website – www.betterbet.net.au
Or call us on 1300 00 BBET (2238)

If you like our app, please don’t forget to leave a 5-Star review.

Enjoy and good luck in your competition

title: Sure Bet
description:
Simple sure bet, or arbitrage bet, calculator for betting purposes.
A sure bet is a set of bets where you are sure to win money, irrespective of what the outcome of the event turns out to be. They exists because each bookmaker has another odd for a pick.

title: Bet Blocker
description:
Support can be reached at admin@betblocker.org. Responses will be provided within 48 hours.

Leaving negative reviews without contacting support is actively harmful to others experiencing issues with gambling addiction. As of 19/02/2020 BetBlocker has been downloaded over 10k times. We have 3.8k people (+approx 10/day) actively using the app. Of the 198 reviews we have received, 70 of them are 1 star. Almost without exception those reviews relate to technical issues with the users handset/network that could be resolved by either contacting support, or are only resolveable by contact their network provider. The majority of these users never contacted support even after we responded to them. 

The small proportion of our users who choose to use Play Store reviews to vent have a disproportionately negative impact on BetBlocker's store rating when considered against the THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE USING THE APP WITHOUT ISSUE. Using Play Store reviews in this manner discourages other people experiencing gambling addiction from seeking help. We're happy to receive negative reviews where appropriate, but leaving negative reviews before or instead of contacting support hurts other users. Please ensure you have actually tried to contact support before posting reviews.

--------------------------------------

BetBlocker is a free tool to help you control your gambling. Install it on as many devices as you like and you can block yourself from accessing over 5700 gambling websites. You can select how long you want to be blocked for.

- All users should be aware that once activated the app CANNOT be removed until your exclusion period has been concluded. For testing purposes we would recommend that all users trial BetBlocker in 'Parental Control' mode where it can be disarmed via your chosen password to ensure it does what you need it to do before you activate a 'Gambling Self-Restriction' that locks the device for the selected duration.

- If you experience a technical issue please contact support either through the app, via the contact us form on our site or by emailing admin@betblocker.org. Remember to include your email address or we will not be able to respond to you.

- Users should be aware that our support sevice will NOT help you remove the app. If there is a technical issue we will look to provide a fix for this issue. We will NOT remove the block while our Development Team works on the issue.

- If you find a url that has not been restricted that should be restricted please use the in app 'Suggest a website to block' feature or contact us on admin@betblocker.org. When we add a site to the restricted list it will take 24 hours to reflect at the user's end and you will need to restart your device.

Please keep in mind when contacting support that BetBlocker is a charity staffed by volunteers. 

Users should also be aware that we will not disarm the app because "someone else installed this on my device" or because you tell us you are "selling my device". We have no reliable method of proving either of these claims and we have to prioritise minimising the risk of exposing a potentially vulnerable individual to gambling again. 

While we understand it can be frustrating waiting for a technical issue to be resolved or where we refuse to disarm the app at your request, many of our users have significant addictive tendencies connected with gambling. Where you activate a Gambling Self-Restriction you are making a statement that you do not want to be allowed the choice to remove this restriction before the selected restriction period has concluded. You agree to this in our terms of service.

We will only ever disarm the app as a last possible resort, where we have fully researched your issue and concluded that we will not be able to offer a fix.


This app uses the Device Administrator permission. Activating this admin app will allow to BetBlocker to perform to following operations: 

1. Activate this device admin app
2. Cancel
3. Uninstall app
summary: BetBlocker is a charity providing a free tool to help you control your gambling.

title: Valuebet App - Betting Tips
description:
The Valuebet App is a sports betting price comparison app to help Sports Bettors with betting tips and strategies to win more sports bets by comparing the price of their Odds to the Market price to determine its value. The key to successful sports betting or any form of gambling is to extract value from a bet. Value means that the odds you are getting is better than the 'Market' Odds. Finding underpriced odds and making consistent value bets will ensure long-term betting success. The app is a value bet calculator that simplifies the math for the user.

Sports bettors usually bet on emotions or bias information. Imagine before buying a phone, you do a price comparison. If the phone is priced on the market at $150, but you can buy it at $110, then you are getting value. Conversely, if the phone is priced at $100 and you are paying $110, then you are overpaying. This principle can be applied to Sports Betting. If you are paying $110 for a bet that should be priced at $150, then you are getting value.

Winning at sports betting in the long-term is not about picking winners, but about finding value. The Valuebet App helps sports bettor win more bets by allowing them to input the odds they receive, and compare it to the other odds available on the market. They will then be able to know which bet is a good value bet, and which bet is a bad bet.  This will prevent sports bettors from making bad bets where they overpay for a sports bet.

Key Features:
	•	Input your Odds
	•	Compare your Odds to the market
	•	See if you are getting value based on the Value Points
	•	Get notified whenever there is a big line movement
	•	Only make bets where you are getting value
	•	Win more Sports Bets
	•	FREE to use everyday

Step 1: Sign up with your Name and Email
Step 2: Upon registration, you will receive 2 FREE tokens daily
Step 3: Go to the ’Available’ screen and see the games that you want to unlock
Step 4: Unlock the games you want, which will be moved to ‘Watching’
Step 5: Go to ‘Watching’ screen and see the data about the games you unlocked
Step 6: Adjust the Odds and Price in ‘Watching’ to compare it to the market

See our FAQ for more details: http://valuebet.co/help-center/

Check out our Blog to learn how the Valuebet App can help you win more Sports Bets: http://valuebet.co/blog/


***The Value Bet Pro app is coming later, with many features and enhancements to make it even to make value bets. Make the value bet app the only sports betting app you'll ever need.***

The Valuebet app is not a sportsbook, and is not affiliated with any betting or gambling sites. The Valuebet is a sports betting app and tool that gives betting tips by comparing user's Odds against the Market Odds. 

The Valuebet App makes watching sports more enjoyable as a casual bettor by giving the user a value edge over the person they are betting with. Betting with you friends can let you enjoy things such as a win free meal, or  the next round of beer. 

Regardless whether you are a professional bettor who needs a simple by highly useful value bet app calculator, or a casual bettor looking for a small edge by finding value bets, the Valuebet App caters to both type. Check it out, you won't be disappointed.
summary: Win more sports bets with the Valuebet App, a revolutionary sports betting tool.

title: Wannabet - Bet 365 Days a Year With Your Friends
description:
Wannabet - Prove you’re better

Bet with friends and without money! Wannabet is the first peer-to-peer betting app that allows you to bet free with your friends and bet rivals. Choose the game you want, create a wager and show your betting skills to the players around the world. Wannabet provides you an experience of betting without losing and risk as all the coins stay between players and not going to the third party. Wannabet can be played without giving any deposit which allows you to play this game on your terms! Accept or decline live bets for matches played at the moment.
 
If you ever wondered where to bet on sports online with your friends or rival fans, Wannabet is an app for you. Bet 365 days in a year with your friends or rivals and climb the leaderboard to prove you’re the best predictor there is.
We connect you with players all around the globe and let you bet fair with them on the terms you as players chose. No more unfair odds. Scroll to the list of available matchups and choose yourself which bet is the best for you or create your terms and wait for someone to think the opposite way. If you ever felt like bet can never be won by betting in traditional brick and mortar betting houses, you will have to give Wannabet a try. Using this app represents going back to the roots as Wannabet is bringing betting to what it was in the first place - a fair wager between two people thinking the opposite ways.

Create private leagues and more with our Leagues feature, bet on live matches and never have a dull moment when watching sports. Wannabet is created by players for players and we strive to create a community of betting experts who will play and compete with each other and not against the betting house. 

Being big sports fans we were always excited when game days approached and our favorite teams were about to play. This excitement was much higher when the game was against the rival teams. But we wondered how to make it even more exciting? How could we compete against rival fans? And most importantly, how can we make this process simple and seamless?

That is why Wannabet was created. It allows users to create bets and engage in bets on their terms. Using the latest technology, Wannabet will allow people from all around the world to bet against their friends, rival fans or whoever they want, and Wannabet will ensure fairness of the outcome and winnings allocation. Finally, we are using virtual currency, because Wannabet is about excitement and competition, and not false promises of unrealistic monetary gains.

FIBA World Cup 2019 Beta

After the beta testing of the FIFA World Cup last year, we decided to go through one more phase of testing the concept. Bet on outcomes, number of points and live stats in a tournament which will be in focus of all basketball lovers this summer. Be the best predictor of the tournament and earn the role of Wannabet MVP from 31st of August until the 15th of September during the FIBA World Cup 2019. Get the chance to prove the basketball world that you know what will happen next and earn those bragging rights!
summary: Bet fairly with your friends or anyone. FIBA World Cup 2019 bets are on!

description:
Tipstar is made for football bettors and statistics lovers.
We provide football matches predictions thanks to predictive algorithms and our football gurus team. 

You'll read the predictions developed by our experts and know with absolute precision their odds which are based on their statistics. Turning notifications on you'll receive real time predictions by the gurus you decide to follow and never miss their tips.

Choose your favorite team to quick access relevant information and the latest news. Use the in-app chat to exchange opinions about matches with other users and to talk to our gurus.

Our algorithms process predictions relying on complex math models as Poisson Distribution, ELO ranking and goal difference match ratings applied to a more than 100.000 matches data set.

title: Predictor for friends
description:
Predictor for Friends – the must-have app for any football fan and tipster group!

Grab your friends, family, and colleagues, create groups, choose a league or five and bet on all European top leagues and the English Premier League!

These leagues and competitions are included in the 2019/20 season of Predictor for Friends:

- European Championship Qualification
- Nations League
- Champions League
- Women Champions League
- Europa League
- Premier League (England)
- 1. & 2. Bundesliga (Germany)
- 3. Liga (Germany)
- DFB Pokal (Germany)
- Regionalliga Bavaria (Germany)
- Super League (Switzerland)
- Bundesliga (Austria)
- Ligue 1 (France)
- Primera Division (Spain)
- Serie A (Italy)
- Süper Lig (Turkey)
- Eredivisie (Netherlands)
- Jupiler League (Belgium)
- Primeira Liga (Portugal)
- Premjer-Liga (Russia)
- Super League (Greece)

There‘s something for everyone!


FEATURES

Predictor for Friends comes with a long list of features:

- Sort matches for date or matchday
- Current table
- Top 100 ranking for players and groups
- Champion bet for every competition
- Matchday ranking in your groups
- Create and join an infinite amount of groups
- Chat with your friends and fellow football fans in groups
- Invite your friends via Group Codes, Facebook, WhatsApp or mail
- Change the style of your app
- Push notifications for bet reminders and new match results

PREMIUM FEATURES

All those who want an even better experience with Predictor for Friends can buy an annual ticket and get even more features!

- Bet history and statistics of other users
- Friends bets after kick-off
- No ads

SCORING & PLAYTIME

Who would’ve guessed the marvelous 4:0 for England in the Europa League 2016 Qualifications match against Lithuania?

Fate rewards the bold, and sometimes it’s advisable to go completely overboard with your bets. Predictor for Friends takes the regular playtime and added time into consideration – no matter the results after a penalty shootout. So betting on a draw isn’t an insensible thing to do even in a big tournament.

Additionally, you can place a Champion Bet in every competition. Intuition, analysis, it doesn’t matter: Betting on the right champion gives you bonus points in every competition!

GROUPS & GLOBAL RANKINGS

Group rankings turn friends into competitors: Whoever gains the highest amount of points betting receives the crown at the end of the season. Matchday rankings shorten the intervals between celebrations, since everyone’s might be having good or bad days betting.

And of course being at the top of the global rankings is where it’s at! Will your group make it among the Top 100?

There’s only one time for football – everywhere, all year! You won’t miss another match with Predictor for Friends, staying connected to what matters most: Your friends and football.

Download Predictor for Friends and see for yourselves!

Have a great football season and good luck betting!

title: BetMines Free Football Betting Tips & Predictions
description:
Over 400,000 users rely on BetMines. Follow our daily betting tips for football, analyse team statistics, follow other tipsters bets, test your strategy by creating free virtual football bets, follow livescore and much more!

BetMines is a totally free football betting support application that offers several tools to help you increase your success rate and teach you how to bet!

---- DAILY TIPS ----

We are the best football predictions and football tips app. We provide FREE and accurate daily football betting predictions and tips for each match elaborated by an artificial intelligence algorithm constantly evolving.
The algorithm takes into account the history of the results of the teams, the state of recent form, head-2-head matches, home and away performances, statistical data of the reference league, any sidelined player, the fluctuation of odds (provided by an important bookmaker) and on the basis of these and other data elaborates the most likely outcome of each match.

In addition to the football tips of the algorithm, we also provide two bets of the day elaborated by our team of football betting experts: Doubling and Risk of the Day.
All the bet predictions are free!

---- SOCIAL FOOTBALL BETTING ------

Football betting becomes social!
You can follow the best tipsters in the application, copy their bets and become yourself a reference point for the community .

When you sign up you will receive 1000 virtual diamonds with which you can create virtual bets , both to test your gaming strategies and to challenge other tipsters and climb the rankings of the best tipsters of the day, week, month and ever.

The ranking is based on the profit generated by the tipster in the concerned period , so you can easily identify the best BetMines's tipster!
The best daily bets will be published on our social channels.
NB: You don't win any cash prizes, these are virtual bets ( and not real money ) with the aim of testing your gaming strategies and having fun at the same time!


---- TEAMS STATISTICS ------

For each team involved in the match we provide the results of the last 5 matches in general, the last 5 at home and the last 5 away games.
For the last 10 matches of each team we also provide:

- the percentage of results 1.5+,2.5+ and 3.5+ goals, Both team to score, 3 Way Result
- the mean of the corners
- Total goals
- Clean sheet matches

---- LEAGUE STATISTICS ----

For each league we supply:

- Standings
- Percentages of 1.5+,2.5+, 3.5+ goals and both team to score outcomes
- The minutes of the goals
- Average goal per game
- Average of yellow and red cards


---- BETMINES MACHINE.

It is a tool that allows you to generate bets with a high probability of success taking into account the selected criteria.
You choose the leagues you want to bet on, the type of event (1X2, double chance, under/over , combo and both team to score), the desired odds range, the number of matches and BetMines will generate for you the most likely bet based on the criteria you have chosen.


---- OTHER FEATURES ----

- possibility to choose your favorite leagues
- possibility to follow the results live thanks to a livescore service
- possibility to access the best odds for each event
- possibility to identify similar matches in terms of odds
- possibility of receiving push notifications when our suggested bets are published, when a tipster you follow posts a bet or when the bet you placed is winning.


You can follow us on:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/betmines_app/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/betmines/

Follow BetMines football predictions, analyse the statistics provided, follow the best tipsters and create your own winning football bets for FREE!

https://betmines.com/TermsOfUse.html

title: Sure Bet Predictions
description:

Usage:
To get bet predictions of different matches select the top-left corner menu bar to open navigation panel. Click on "Predictions", wait for data to load, then select match of interest when it finishes loading. To get Prediction and Tip, Click on the "View Tip". Tips are given after the reason for prediction decision at the bottom end of the view. Therefore, scroll down.
To see Football Betting Tips, without preview details, click on the top-left corner menu bar. Select "Tips", wait for data to load. When betting tips have loaded, scroll to league of interest. 

Further Details:
Tips sections has different statuses. If a game has not been played, it has no scores and is listed as "Not Played". Played matches with the prediction successful is marked as "Success". And finally "Failed" for Tip that went wrong. Sometimes games are cancelled and not played, thus we mark such matches as "Cancelled".

To get the best of our application, use it ever day, checking both predictions and betting tips listed.

Notifications:

title: Free Betting Tips on MMA
description:
Bet MMA is an MMA handicapper directory of the top MMA tipsters in the business. We give out both free and paid (mostly free) MMA betting tips / picks on the UFC and other MMA orgs such as WSOF, Bellator and One FC. Anyone can sign up as a handicapper; this isn't a closed shop... So whoever does well ends up leading the table and giving you the best picks! 

MMA is the fastest growing sport in the world - why not bet on it? If you already get free sports betting tips for football, basketball, baseball, golf, boxing, NFL... whatever... I am confident our handicappers can match any other sports tipsters out there and ultimately, make you money, which is what matters!

We have clear and easy to understand betting histories for all the handicappers, making it easy to see who's worth following. When you do follow someone, you can receive email notifications whenever that MMA handicappers makes a new prediction. 

Introduction to me and why use this app? 
BetMMA.tips is run by me, Mike Jeynes, a long time sports and MMA fan living in Leeds, UK. I've been working in MMA full time since 2009 and branched into betting on the UFC as an interesting project in 2014.

So why use this app? Plenty of people offer betting tips but very few of them are independently verified. If you're following some dude who set up his own app and offers his own tips, do you honestly believe their stated profit history when they can basically say whatever they like? It doesn't matter to me which handicapper ends up being profitable so I don't need to fake any results or hide bad picks: We've got plenty of MMA handicappers (128 at the time of writing) so the cream rises to the top and you follow those picks! 

The app also includes betting tools:
- A free surebet / arbitrage calculator.
- A parlay / accumulator odds calculator.
- Odds conversion tool.
- Guides to betting on MMA written by myself.
- A log of which bookmakers tend to offer the best odds on MMA / The UFC. 

All for free, so check it out! :)

title: Football Betting Tips : Free Football Prediction
description:
Statistical prediction is a method used in sports betting, to predict the outcome of matches by means of statistical tools and using complex math formulas. 

  

Who doesn’t want to predict the result of a football (soccer) match? The best way to make a prognosis is to estimate the probability of the outcome. 

You cannot work out the probability of winning a football match by assuming that win, lose and draw are equally likely, 

but you can look at previous results in similar matches and use these results to estimate the probability of winning. 

  

Football Prediction app doesn't have emotions and it doesn't support any club. It knows nothing about the number of fans or the amount of money clubs have. 

The only thing that matters are previous results and based on them it predicts the future results. 

And it's really good at it. 

  

This application tracks all league matches of the world most famous leagues including: 

-  England 

-  Spain 

-  Germany 

-  Italy 

-  France 

-  Netherlands 

-  Portugal 

-  Turkey 

-  Russia 

-  Belgium 

-  Polen 

-  Czech Republic 

-  Scotland 

-  Romania 

-  Austria 

-  Hungary 

-  Ukraine 

-  Sweden 

-  Norway 

-  Greece 

  

  

There are many other leagues too and we are constantly trying to increase the number of leagues. 

If you can't find your local league, use "manual input" and enter performance data by yourself. You will get an equally good calculation. 

  

The app will estimate the probability of particular match outcome and derivatives of an outcome, such as: 

-  Full Time Outcome, 

-  Half Time Result, 

-  Double Chance, 

-  Draw No Bet, 

-  HT/FT, 

-  Handicap, 

-  Goals Under/Over, 

-  Exact Goals, 

-  Exact Score. 

  

Everything is transparent and beautifully organized by leagues, seasons and by rounds so that every match, pre-match predictions and the results of matches can easily be found. 

Data used to predict the match are the ones that were available before the match was played. 

Once you download data you can use the application in an offline mode. 

  

This is not a live score app but results are refreshed at least once a day which is enough for quality predictions. 

  

We don't need to give you false promises about how good is app, at any time you can check all previous predictions and their efficiency in reviews organized by leagues, odds type and time period. 

  

IMPORTANT NOTE: This application does not encourage sports betting in any way, it is intended for informational and entertainment purposes only! 

  

This is a FREE version (Ad - supported), if you like Football Prediction you can buy the version without ads through a link in our app.

title: Gambling Therapy
description:
A free app providing a collection of tools and information to help you identify and overcome problem gambling.
 
Download the GT app if you feel that any of these things describe you or someone you care about:
 
• you feel that you are preoccupied with gambling
• previous attempts to cut or stop gambling have failed
• you feel the need to increase your bets 
• you gamble when you feel stressed or upset
• you gamble to try and win back your losses
• you attempt to conceal the extent of your gambling
• you struggling financially because of your gambling
• your relationships are suffering because of your gambling
 
Problem gambling (sometimes referred to as gambling addiction) is an urge to gamble despite mounting negative consequences. The Gambling Therapy app has been designed to help those that are struggling with problem gambling by providing easy to access information and straightforward tools.
 
Key features of the Gambling Therapy app are:
 
• self assessment questionnaire
• text based live support
• mindfulness and self help exercises
• crisis support information
• daily motivational quotes
• links to blocking software
• directory of organisations that can help
• access to the GT online forums
 
Gambling Therapy is part of the Gordon Moody Association - a registered charity with over 40 years experience in providing support and treatment for problem gambling.
summary: Online help for problem gamblers
recentChanges: Fixed a bug where the app would occasionally crash on start-up.

title: Bet Blocker
description:
Support can be reached at admin@betblocker.org. Responses will be provided within 48 hours.

Leaving negative reviews without contacting support is actively harmful to others experiencing issues with gambling addiction. As of 19/02/2020 BetBlocker has been downloaded over 10k times. We have 3.8k people (+approx 10/day) actively using the app. Of the 198 reviews we have received, 70 of them are 1 star. Almost without exception those reviews relate to technical issues with the users handset/network that could be resolved by either contacting support, or are only resolveable by contact their network provider. The majority of these users never contacted support even after we responded to them. 

The small proportion of our users who choose to use Play Store reviews to vent have a disproportionately negative impact on BetBlocker's store rating when considered against the THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE USING THE APP WITHOUT ISSUE. Using Play Store reviews in this manner discourages other people experiencing gambling addiction from seeking help. We're happy to receive negative reviews where appropriate, but leaving negative reviews before or instead of contacting support hurts other users. Please ensure you have actually tried to contact support before posting reviews.

--------------------------------------

BetBlocker is a free tool to help you control your gambling. Install it on as many devices as you like and you can block yourself from accessing over 5700 gambling websites. You can select how long you want to be blocked for.

- All users should be aware that once activated the app CANNOT be removed until your exclusion period has been concluded. For testing purposes we would recommend that all users trial BetBlocker in 'Parental Control' mode where it can be disarmed via your chosen password to ensure it does what you need it to do before you activate a 'Gambling Self-Restriction' that locks the device for the selected duration.

- If you experience a technical issue please contact support either through the app, via the contact us form on our site or by emailing admin@betblocker.org. Remember to include your email address or we will not be able to respond to you.

- Users should be aware that our support sevice will NOT help you remove the app. If there is a technical issue we will look to provide a fix for this issue. We will NOT remove the block while our Development Team works on the issue.

- If you find a url that has not been restricted that should be restricted please use the in app 'Suggest a website to block' feature or contact us on admin@betblocker.org. When we add a site to the restricted list it will take 24 hours to reflect at the user's end and you will need to restart your device.

Please keep in mind when contacting support that BetBlocker is a charity staffed by volunteers. 

Users should also be aware that we will not disarm the app because "someone else installed this on my device" or because you tell us you are "selling my device". We have no reliable method of proving either of these claims and we have to prioritise minimising the risk of exposing a potentially vulnerable individual to gambling again. 

While we understand it can be frustrating waiting for a technical issue to be resolved or where we refuse to disarm the app at your request, many of our users have significant addictive tendencies connected with gambling. Where you activate a Gambling Self-Restriction you are making a statement that you do not want to be allowed the choice to remove this restriction before the selected restriction period has concluded. You agree to this in our terms of service.

We will only ever disarm the app as a last possible resort, where we have fully researched your issue and concluded that we will not be able to offer a fix.


This app uses the Device Administrator permission. Activating this admin app will allow to BetBlocker to perform to following operations: 

1. Activate this device admin app
2. Cancel
3. Uninstall app
summary: BetBlocker is a charity providing a free tool to help you control your gambling.

title: Cherry Chaser Slot Machine
description:
With Cherry Chaser fruit machine you can play as much as you like, as often as you like, entirely for free.

This free slot machine game has Nudges, Steppa-win, Stoppa-win, Win-spins and the special Cherry Chaser feature for big payouts! This fruit machine is feature packed and sure to keep you entertained.

Slot machine features:
- Nudges: Automatic nudge to nearest best win.
- StoppaWin: Choose your win, collect what you see or wait for a better win line.
- SteppaWin: Step down the reels to match the reel that you choose.
- WinSpins: The slot machine keeps spinning wins, and the slot machine keeps paying out.

title: Gambling Therapy
description:
A free app providing a collection of tools and information to help you identify and overcome problem gambling.
 
Download the GT app if you feel that any of these things describe you or someone you care about:
 
• you feel that you are preoccupied with gambling
• previous attempts to cut or stop gambling have failed
• you feel the need to increase your bets 
• you gamble when you feel stressed or upset
• you gamble to try and win back your losses
• you attempt to conceal the extent of your gambling
• you struggling financially because of your gambling
• your relationships are suffering because of your gambling
 
Problem gambling (sometimes referred to as gambling addiction) is an urge to gamble despite mounting negative consequences. The Gambling Therapy app has been designed to help those that are struggling with problem gambling by providing easy to access information and straightforward tools.
 
Key features of the Gambling Therapy app are:
 
• self assessment questionnaire
• text based live support
• mindfulness and self help exercises
• crisis support information
• daily motivational quotes
• links to blocking software
• directory of organisations that can help
• access to the GT online forums
 
Gambling Therapy is part of the Gordon Moody Association - a registered charity with over 40 years experience in providing support and treatment for problem gambling.
summary: Online help for problem gamblers
recentChanges: Fixed a bug where the app would occasionally crash on start-up.

title: Gambling Addiction Therapy - Get Professional Help
description:
Our online therapists are here to offer you all the help, support and professional tools you'll need to conquer your gambling addiction. We are here for you in those key moments when confronted with the impulse to engage in gambling in spite of being aware of the negative effects gambling has on your life.
	
We offer you nothing less than the best and most compassionate, caring therapists that will accompany you in every step of the way, and provide you with workable tools and boundless encouragement to battle your addiction.
	
The Gambling Addiction therapy app is designed in a way that provides each individual with the most precise therapy along with a comprehensive toolkit of advanced counseling techniques: 

•	Match with your therapist by a personalized questionnaire
•	Leave a message to your therapist at all hours
•	Receive assistance anytime and from anywhere
•	Choose you preferred method of communication
•	Online community support for those who desire
•	Extended education center free for all app users

Being accompanied by an online therapist has been proven to make a world of difference when coping with gambling rehab. When it comes to gambling treatment, over 94% of users are reporting significant progress and over 92% stated they prefer the online therapy method over a therapist's office.

Who we are and what we do
The Gambling Addiction therapy site is a collaborative effort by fully qualified and educated therapists specializing in gambling addiction - to provide 24/7 support to anyone who seeks it.
Following official guidelines similar to those of gamblers anonymous, we offer completely discreet online therapy conducted through secure means of communication via phone, text chat etc. 

Recognizing the symptoms of a gambling problem
The emotion behind compulsive gambling, as described and articulated by many addicted gamblers, is that of being preoccupied with the need to engage in this action, often triggered by feelings of stress or distress.
This behavior pattern is inevitably followed by the need for winning back gambling losses and increasing bet amounts - resulting in gambling substantial debt.

In other words, the effort to quit gambling is overcome by a stronger impulse realized as part of a gambling disorder, impacting one's life both financially as well as having an effect on personal relationships.

Education center - understanding the gambler’s psyche

o	Learn all about the symptoms and rationality of pathological gambling
o	Recognize the patterns that drive the addicted gambler behavior

title: Bet Blocker
description:
Support can be reached at admin@betblocker.org. Responses will be provided within 48 hours.

Leaving negative reviews without contacting support is actively harmful to others experiencing issues with gambling addiction. As of 19/02/2020 BetBlocker has been downloaded over 10k times. We have 3.8k people (+approx 10/day) actively using the app. Of the 198 reviews we have received, 70 of them are 1 star. Almost without exception those reviews relate to technical issues with the users handset/network that could be resolved by either contacting support, or are only resolveable by contact their network provider. The majority of these users never contacted support even after we responded to them. 

The small proportion of our users who choose to use Play Store reviews to vent have a disproportionately negative impact on BetBlocker's store rating when considered against the THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE USING THE APP WITHOUT ISSUE. Using Play Store reviews in this manner discourages other people experiencing gambling addiction from seeking help. We're happy to receive negative reviews where appropriate, but leaving negative reviews before or instead of contacting support hurts other users. Please ensure you have actually tried to contact support before posting reviews.

--------------------------------------

BetBlocker is a free tool to help you control your gambling. Install it on as many devices as you like and you can block yourself from accessing over 5700 gambling websites. You can select how long you want to be blocked for.

- All users should be aware that once activated the app CANNOT be removed until your exclusion period has been concluded. For testing purposes we would recommend that all users trial BetBlocker in 'Parental Control' mode where it can be disarmed via your chosen password to ensure it does what you need it to do before you activate a 'Gambling Self-Restriction' that locks the device for the selected duration.

- If you experience a technical issue please contact support either through the app, via the contact us form on our site or by emailing admin@betblocker.org. Remember to include your email address or we will not be able to respond to you.

- Users should be aware that our support sevice will NOT help you remove the app. If there is a technical issue we will look to provide a fix for this issue. We will NOT remove the block while our Development Team works on the issue.

- If you find a url that has not been restricted that should be restricted please use the in app 'Suggest a website to block' feature or contact us on admin@betblocker.org. When we add a site to the restricted list it will take 24 hours to reflect at the user's end and you will need to restart your device.

Please keep in mind when contacting support that BetBlocker is a charity staffed by volunteers. 

Users should also be aware that we will not disarm the app because "someone else installed this on my device" or because you tell us you are "selling my device". We have no reliable method of proving either of these claims and we have to prioritise minimising the risk of exposing a potentially vulnerable individual to gambling again. 

While we understand it can be frustrating waiting for a technical issue to be resolved or where we refuse to disarm the app at your request, many of our users have significant addictive tendencies connected with gambling. Where you activate a Gambling Self-Restriction you are making a statement that you do not want to be allowed the choice to remove this restriction before the selected restriction period has concluded. You agree to this in our terms of service.

We will only ever disarm the app as a last possible resort, where we have fully researched your issue and concluded that we will not be able to offer a fix.


This app uses the Device Administrator permission. Activating this admin app will allow to BetBlocker to perform to following operations: 

1. Activate this device admin app
2. Cancel
3. Uninstall app
summary: BetBlocker is a charity providing a free tool to help you control your gambling.
recentChanges: Improve app speed(services)

title: Gambling Addiction, how to stop gambling
description:
Learn tools to cope with your addiction to gambling.

** Download Today and learn the following.

*Learn what gambling addiction is.
*Learn ways to stop gambling.
*Understand the myths about gambling and the consequences. 
*Understand the negative side effects on you and your family.
*Test yourself, read the self-test to see if you have a problem with gambling.

What is Gambling?

Gambling addiction is an urge to gamble continuously despite harmful negative consequences or a desire to stop. Problem gambling is often defined by whether harm is experienced by the gambler or others, rather than by the gambler's behaviour.

Severe problem gambling may be diagnosed as clinical pathological gambling if the gambler meets certain criteria. Pathological gambling is a common disorder that is associated with both social and family costs.

Individuals suffering from compulsive gambling, are novelty seekers, feel disconnected (dissociated), relaxed, or aroused while gambling. 

Research shows individuals who have money problems, win large amounts of money early into gambling, suffer rec losses like divorce, job losses are at an increased risk of developing compulsive gambling.

Symptoms of a gambling addiction may include:
1. A preoccupation with gambling and loss of interest in other hobbies.
2. Increasing the quantities gambled to recoup lost bets or to experience the same thrill.
3. A negative impact upon relationships with those closest to you.
4. Concealing the amount of money and time spent betting from family members.
5. Stealing money in order to gamble.
6. Denial that you have a problem.
In addition to these, you may also suffer from physical symptoms. These symptoms may include anxiety,
irritability, headaches, stomach aches and stress-related symptoms
summary: Gambling Addiction, tools to cope each day and beat your addiction

title: Iowa Gambling Game: Decision Making With Cards
description:
Think you can be in the elite 5% and solve the classic Iowa Gambling Game?! 🏆 Find out with this latest take on a classic psychology experiment. 

Based on a famous psychology experiment called Iowa gambling task, Iowa Gambling Game is designed to help players with decision making using a simulated card game. 🎴 It is commonly used to research brain activity in people through the analysis of cognition and emotional responses.🤔 It involves taking risks that result in rewards or penalties, just like many life decisions we make on a daily basis.

Here are the rules of the game:
➡️The player draws cards from each deck until he or she draws 100 cards. 💯
➡️Each card allows you to win or lose money. 🤑💰💲
➡️There is a scorekeeper at the bottom of the screen to keep track of the scores
➡️After the player has drawn 100 cards, the user needs to select which 2 decks have the most wins and are considered the best decks. 
➡️The best decks vary between each game. 
➡️The rules can also be viewed by tapping on the blue question mark icon. 

If you enjoy strategy games like Yahtzee or Solitaire, then you will enjoy this game.

This is a solo game but feel free to share it with friends who enjoy classic strategy card games.

We hope you have fun playing this exciting game! 😃
summary: A card game based on a psychology experiment that helps in making life decisions

title: Gambling Addiction, Christians seek Gods help
description:
* Are you addicted to gambling?
* Are you feeling stressed and unable to find a solution?
* Have you been struggling for a number of years, thinking you will never beat your addiction?
* Has gambling caused problems in your marriage and family life?
* Has your addiction left you in debt and feeling there is no way out?

**** Well this application and Gods love for you will see you through those dark days.

Thank you for downloading this app about gambling addiction. It’s a simple app that provides basic information and spiritual guidance from the bible. Use it every day in your battle against this addiction.

***Why the app was produced

This app was produced to help Christians around the world cope with their addiction. We are a group of addicts, who formed a collective to produce free resources to help beat this addiction.


There are many Christians around the world who struggle with gambling addiction. They have lied and cheated in order to keep their addiction a secret, and ignored the danger signs of gambling.

They feel ashamed and embarrassed to talk about it to family members and friends. 

Our story

We are committed Christians who want to help anyone who wants help. 

All of us have suffered from the pain of this addiction. 

Some of us have lost jobs, others have lost homes and their marriages due to the strain placed on the marriage.

In some extreme cases, some of us have tried to commit suicide due to the daily pressure this addiction has caused.  

We have tried support groups in order to fight our gambling addiction, but have always been pulled back to it. 

We have used prayer and the Bible to provide us with strength when required.

We love God and want to live and have a better life.  

We are from various backgrounds and age groups, and all of us have stories to tell.
Some of us have been members of churches and seen the preachings of the likes of Billy Graham, Joel Osteen, Walter Hawkins.


What is Gambling?

Gambling addiction is an urge to gamble continuously despite harmful negative consequences or a desire to stop. Problem gambling is often defined by whether harm is experienced by the gambler or others, rather than by the gambler's behaviour.

Severe problem gambling may be diagnosed as clinical pathological gambling if the gambler meets certain criteria. Pathological gambling is a common disorder that is associated with both social and family costs.

With God's love and hope, you will be able to overcome your addiction and live a new life.
 Keep your faith always, as God loves you and will support you when you need it most."

Some Inspiration for you

Proverbs 18:10 The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run into it and are safe.

Nehemiah 8:10 Do not grieve, for the joy of the Lord is your strength.
Isaiah 41:10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

Exodus 15:2 The Lord is my strength and my song; he has given me victory. This is my God, and I will praise him— my father’s God, and I will exalt him!

*Anxiety and Depression
Some people who gamble excessively feel stressed, anxious and depressed. Therefore sleeping, thinking and solving problems can become more difficult.

You may have chronic depression if you have some of the symptoms below for more than two weeks. We urge you to seek professional help.

Loss of interest in usual activities
Feeling depressed or irritable
Your sleep pattern has changed, that is you have problems falling asleep or staying asleep

*Your appetite has changed
*You have lost or gained weight
*You feel helpless, hopeless or despairing
*It is hard to think and to remember things, and your thoughts seem slower
*You go over and over guilty feelings
*You can’t stop thinking about problems
*You have lost interest in sex
*You feel physically tired, slow and heavy; or you feel restless and jumpy
*You feel angry
*You think about suicide
summary: Gambling Addiction, Gods love will help beat your addiction. Download Today.
